body:
On Oct 23, 2007, at 12:39 PM, Rob Guglielmetti wrote:




> As a very recent licensee of SketchUp Pro, I too would be  
> interested in your translator, Thomas!  I'd also like to hear  
> (maybe off-list) your thoughts on how to model accurately in  
> SketchUp, since it seems to still lack direct coordinate input,  
> UCSs, and the object snaps seem a little lean compared to ACAD...


It's perfectly good at relative co-ordinates (4'11.5" along the X- 
axis from that point).


Randolph


Of course, it keeps everything in inches, which is weird, but there  
are exact conversions to SI units.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2007-October/004515.html).</sup>
